positions.subtitle: ScaleTech Solutions
positions.description: - Leading and mentoring a diverse frontend team, driving continuous growth and development through personalized learning paths, one-on-one feedback sessions, and goal-setting.- Driving team efficiency by optimizing processes, fostering a learning mindset, and implementing technical and operational improvements.- Conducting/facilitating knowledge-sharing sessions and training programs to upskill the team, promoting continuous learning and the adoption of best practices.- Maintaining open communication with management and cross-functional teams to align strategies and share actionable insights across departments.- Continuing to manage end-to-end project execution, client communications, code reviews, and frontend deliverables, ensuring timely and quality releases for high-impact projects such as thjnk24x7, an innovative data-driven automated asset production platform for a leading German digital marketing agency- Spearheading recruitment and onboarding processes, collaborating with HR and leadership to hire top talent while refining interview strategies for more collaborative and dynamic discussions.- Overseeing project execution by translating business requirements into technical solutions, defining sprint plans, and ensuring alignment between teams and stakeholders for seamless project delivery.- Providing technical feasibility insights to support presales efforts, ensuring realistic commitments to clients, and managing resource allocation for successful project demos.- Helping team members to grow and uplift themselves in career and personal growth.
positions.title: Engineering Lead
positions.description_html:
- Leading and mentoring a diverse frontend team, driving continuous growth and development through personalized learning paths, one-on-one feedback sessions, and goal-setting.
- Driving team efficiency by optimizing processes, fostering a learning mindset, and implementing technical and operational improvements.
- Conducting/facilitating knowledge-sharing sessions and training programs to upskill the team, promoting continuous learning and the adoption of best practices.
- Maintaining open communication with management and cross-functional teams to align strategies and share actionable insights across departments.
- Continuing to manage end-to-end project execution, client communications, code reviews, and frontend deliverables, ensuring timely and quality releases for high-impact projects such as thjnk24x7, an innovative data-driven automated asset production platform for a leading German digital marketing agency
- Spearheading recruitment and onboarding processes, collaborating with HR and leadership to hire top talent while refining interview strategies for more collaborative and dynamic discussions.
- Overseeing project execution by translating business requirements into technical solutions, defining sprint plans, and ensuring alignment between teams and stakeholders for seamless project delivery.
- Providing technical feasibility insights to support presales efforts, ensuring realistic commitments to clients, and managing resource allocation for successful project demos.
- Helping team members to grow and uplift themselves in career and personal growth.

positions.subtitle: ScaleTech Solutions
positions.description: - Spearheaded end-to-end project management, overseeing all aspects of frontend development and ensuring seamless project execution- Established and maintained proactive client communication channels, ensuring project alignment with client expectations and promptly addressing any concerns.- Conduct comprehensive code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards, optimizing performance, and promoting best practices within the team.- Demonstrated requirement analysis skills, translating complex business needs into actionable technical specifications for the development team.- Ensured on-time delivery of production-ready frontend deliverables, coordinating with backend teams and QA to guarantee a unified and high-quality product release.- Recruitment process, conducting technical interviews to assess candidates' qualifications, cultural fit, and potential contributions.- Current project: thjnk24x7 by German Top Digital marketing agency https://www.thjnk.de/en -  data-driven automated asset production through creative management
positions.title: Technical Lead
positions.description_html:
- Spearheaded end-to-end project management, overseeing all aspects of frontend development and ensuring seamless project execution
- Established and maintained proactive client communication channels, ensuring project alignment with client expectations and promptly addressing any concerns.
- Conduct comprehensive code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards, optimizing performance, and promoting best practices within the team.
- Demonstrated requirement analysis skills, translating complex business needs into actionable technical specifications for the development team.
- Ensured on-time delivery of production-ready frontend deliverables, coordinating with backend teams and QA to guarantee a unified and high-quality product release.
- Recruitment process, conducting technical interviews to assess candidates' qualifications, cultural fit, and potential contributions.
- Current project: thjnk24x7 by German Top Digital marketing agency https://www.thjnk.de/en - data-driven automated asset production through creative management
